title: 60s-70s calligraphic font
content:
Can somebody help me out with this? I think I got the image from the portfolio of some designer´s current work (even though it looks old), but I lost the reference. Look more like reinterpration than "authentic" calligraphic font. Couldn´t locate it in MyFonts etc. ...

Thanks for any help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150219021820im_/http:/typophile.com/files/omp28_cover2_4384.jpg)

Timo
author: Timo Ilola

comments.content: That was quick, thanks a lot ;)
